author: Zack Budryk
title: Michigan jumps to nearly 8,000 coronavirus cases with concentration in Detroit area
description: Michigan's total confirmed coronavirus cases has jumped to 7,611 after the state counted 1,117 new cases on Tuesday.Michigan reported 75 additional deaths Tuesday, bringing the total fatalities to 259, according to...
content:
Michigans total confirmed coronavirus cases has jumped to 7,611 after the state counted 1,117 new cases on Tuesday.
Michigan reported 75 additional deaths Tuesday, bringing the total fatalities to 259, according to the states daily updates. Confirmed cases h… [+1782 chars]
